oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alexandria Bombardment of 1882 photograph album
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fiorillo, L ., 1870-1889
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph album compiled by photographer Luigi Fiorillo to document the bombardment of Alexandria by British naval forces in 1882.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alexandria (Egypt)--History--Bombardment, 1882.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Alexandria Bombardment of 1882 Photograph Album; Egypt and Middle East Architecture, Landscape, and Travel Photograph Album Collections; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
